snippet.title: TANUKI Pon's Summer – Arriving to XBOX Game Pass
snippet.description:
Pon is a delivery tanuki with a job to do: earn money to restore the Great Tanuki God's shrine. But staying on task isn’t easy when there’s a whole town to explore, tricks to pull off, and plenty of ways to get sidetracked. Between work and play, Pon's summer is shaping up to be anything but ordinary.
Coming to PC and Xbox Game Pass in late 2025.
